title: EkE ninagiSTu
sahitya:
EkE ninagiSTu kanjAla biDo hariye


caraNam 1    cikkavanendu nI Dakku mADalu bEDa kakkasa kucagaLa kaili koDuvaLalla
    caraNam 2    sadhara bEDa ninna bageyella nA balle pedarisidare nAnu anjuva heNNalla
    caraNam 3    sAku ninna sarasa sallApavu bereya bEkendu baruvenu purandara viTTala
